name: INFERTILITY_SPERM_COLLECT
description: The sperm collection methods used during a fertility treatment cycle.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the cycle record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPERM_COLL_C_NAME
columns.description: The methods used to collect sperm from the genetic parent.
